description: ACM_APP_ORIG_SYS_XREF Reference key to account comment of legacy system
ACM_SEQ Sequence number for account comment
ACM_COMMENT A miscellaneous comment entered by the user
ACM_COMMENT_BY The name of the user entering and saving the comment
ACM_COMMENT_TYPE_CD The type of the comment  such as REG - Regular and SYG - System Generated
ACM_COMMENT_SUB_TYPE_CD The sub-type of the comment  such as ORG - Originations
ACM_COMMENT_IMP_IND Indicates if the comment is considered important
ACM_ERROR_IND Error indicator for account comment
